subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Blackout hits Colombia
A nationwide blackout hit Colombia on Thursday, with authorities struggling to determine the cause of the electrical grid's collapse.





2. India court orders Gere's arrest

9. Chemical Ali's kin gunned down





10. 8 die in chain-reaction crash 




 
















Dad, son caught in twisters
I-Reporter Ace Anderson and his 10-year-old son witness two tornados in Coldwater, Kansas. (April 26)
